thread.title: KRas,Mad City WI
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by KRas,Mad City WI

author: KRas,Mad City WI
title: KRas,Mad City WI
text:
I purchased the softail single buckle small bag am very impressed with the
quality and workmanship ,little uncertain about fit as my new night train is still gallivanting acrossed the country I'll know better in about a week.
The fork bags I've had on my dyna in the past pale in comparison to the
Viking double buckle unit I recently received looks great solid construction
and I really like the double fastening straps, should hold the unit in place
better than a single strap around both forks or risers, I'm very anxious to
get some miles on these items to watch them age, Thanx Kevin
